Name: Hanoi
Description: The capital city of Vietnam, known for its ancient architecture, vibrant culture, and as a center of history and politics.

Name: Ho Chi Minh City
Description: Also known as Saigon, it is the largest city in Vietnam, an economic hub, and a vibrant center of commerce and culture.

Name: Da Nang
Description: A coastal city known for its beaches, resorts, and proximity to historical sites like the ancient town of Hoi An.

Name: Hai Phong
Description: A major port city in northern Vietnam, known for its industrial economy and as a gateway to the Red River Delta.

Name: Can Tho
Description: A city in the Mekong Delta, known for its floating markets, riverside life, and agricultural significance.

Name: Nghe An
Description: A province in northern Vietnam, known for its beautiful landscapes, cultural sites, and rich history.

Name: Binh Duong
Description: A province near Ho Chi Minh City, known for its rapid industrial growth and role as a manufacturing center.

Name: Quang Ninh
Description: A province in northeastern Vietnam, famous for Ha Long Bay, a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its stunning seascapes.

Name: Tien Giang
Description: A province in the Mekong Delta, known for its river-based agriculture and scenic landscapes.
